title: PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working
body:
Hello,

I get this error on newly installed 8.1 windows.

Tried the run as administrator nothing works
Tried to deleted some files (from lol air folder) it doesn't even exist, cause it's the first installation on my laptop

Maybe there is some framework I need or other things ... but tried many debug methods and nothing works

If you need the log file, I can give it to you

Please HAAALP

replies.body:
Running as admin is a good first step, because this error usually occurs when a security setting is preventing the patcher from launching.  You'll want to also go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to add League as an exception and resolve this!

If the issue persists, toss those logs in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can look into it with you directly!

Thank you for your answer
I'll try your solutions, if it still show me the PVP error i'll add a support ticket
